attributes.action: Utilise mobile phone jammers in prisons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: these devices will stop the terroists from communicating via mobile phones webwise... or otherwise. Jamming equipment is illegal to use in the UK as it violates sections 1 & 13 of the 1949 telegraphy act... this should be excepted in the case of prisoners who would pose a danger to our country.
